rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with a sleek design and natural lighting from large windows, incorporating Vastu principles by orienting it towards the north-east for prosperity.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-concept space with sliding glass doors to access a private outdoor terrace. Natural ventilation is enhanced via strategically placed cross-ventilation windows and an open ceiling design that allows light diffusion throughout the day.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with smart appliances, designed to be energy efficient with natural light from a north-facing window. Complies with Vastu by positioning it in the east for balance and functionality.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxury bedroom with ample storage and built-in closet space, designed to face south for restful sleep and privacy. Large windows ensure natural ventilation and light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Compact yet comfortable bedroom that incorporates Vastu principles by being placed in the west to maintain balance within the space.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with dual sink and natural lighting from skylights. Designed for functionality and ease of maintenance, adhering to Vastu by being placed in a corner that ensures water flow without stagnation.

rooms.name: Studio Area
rooms.description: Multi-purpose studio space ideal for work or leisure, featuring abundant natural light and ventilation via multiple windows along the south wall. The layout encourages creativity and productivity.

openings.description: Double door entrance with modern glass panel design that aligns with Vastu principles by facilitating positive energy flow.
Dedicated entry for a two-car garage, designed to integrate seamlessly with the property while providing secure access and ample space for vehicles.
